Text: Uploader: could you please seed a little longer so some of us could get to 100% ?  We're almost there, but not quite. Thanks.

When I stopped seeding there was in excess of 50 seeders. By that time I think I have done my bit.

What pisses me off is that of the 18 books I have posted lately is that there is not one thanks comment, just a wine from someone who not shared anything on TPB.

You ungrateful bunch of bastards can find your books from some one else.
Thanks for your great books.Keep up the good work.
Thanks for your great books. Keep up the good work!

thanks man i have similar tastes to you & have enjoyed your books, your comment about not uploading is taken on board & I will upload what I have new within the next few days , I must admit though, I do seed, at least 4x what I upload, unless it is c**p I will lso comment  & thank more all the best & once again thanks
